page.title: 09YEOMAN HILL PARK
page.content: { Yeoman Hill Park}is in the centre of Mansfield Woodhouse, opposite the church.A class of{Lower Infants visited the park and found out the following. There are 4 gates, the main one being in front of the War Memorial, Priory Road.A second leads to the children's play area which is divided from the rest of the park by a fence.{Sports areas}are a football pitch, bowling green and B.M.X track. Also 2 tennis courts, but one is disused,as is the graffiti covered band stand. We counted 9 benches,17 flowers beds and a small rockery.{In {one hour we saw 17 adults using the {park.}Four had dogs and 3 had young children.{The children tried the play {equipment}and{voted}for the one{they {preferred.}Small slides 11,large slides 3, sandpit 3, roundabout 4, jeep 1.No one liked the swings!{C5S.E.
